## Types and classes 
### Types
```{r}
typeof(1.5)#double: numerical value
typeof("toto")
typeof('also between single quotes')
typeof(TRUE)
typeof(1L)
typeof(1)
typeof(typeof)
typeof(list())
```
types defined set with associated operations.
double roughly real numbers.
everything id a double if you don't tell R integer.
logical for testing.
